GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE CAN_ATTACK CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS PRELOAD SCORE HUGE_VEHICLE UNIQUE_UNIT LARGE_RECTANGLE_PATHFIND ATTACK_NEEDS_LINE_OF_SIGHT VEHICLE CAN_SEE_THROUGH_STRUCTURE LINE_OF_SIGHT_IGNORES_BUILDINGS CAN_BE_FAVORITE_UNIT SLAVE_OWNER

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_SelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToIdle") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_built" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_built") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_bored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") end
